attributes.action: Support a green recovery for Europe
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Dear Mr Prime Minister,

One path to a sustainable recovery is to invest in a cleaner, greener economy and reduce our dependence on fossil fuels. To create green jobs and protect our common future, I urge you to commit as much as possible of the economic output of the UK to green recovery measures -- and to challenge other nations to do the same.

Sincerely,
